commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: *Sigh* I'm worried about Honoka. She isn't getting carried away and doing something silly, is she?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh?! She should be fine, right? I mean, she always looks like she has it all together on stage.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: On stage, she is admittedly reliable, but when it comes to her private life, Honoka is truly--

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: You know, I know how you feel! I'm a little worried that Chika will do something ridiculous, too.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Riko! You, too? You must have it tough.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: And you, too, Umi!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh, they seem to be hitting it off.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Umi sounds all worried, but she really wanted to go with Honoka.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Whuh?!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Umi, too? Our Riko's the exact same. She's acting all worried, but honestly, she just loves Chika.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Giggle* I guess they're hiding their embarrassment? They're so cute.

commands.speaker: Umi, Riko
commands.line: You've got it all wrong!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You don't need to be all bashful about it! And sure, you might miss those two, but let's have some fun together today!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I am hardly embarrassed or anything of the sort, but... Ahem. Right you are. I'll trust in Honoka, so let us get to know each other better today.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Y-Yeah, good idea. She's with those two, so I'm sure it'll be fine.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You don't have to be all embarrassed, you two. Isn't it great to love your friends?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I mean, I truly love our club president, and she loves me just as much!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Sh-She treats us all equally well. I've known her since we were little, so I can tell.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I-I know her well, too!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: W-Well I've known her since we were quite young, and--

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: C'mon, you two! Let's calm down a bit, yeah?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Oh, before I forget. Ayumu, have you heard anything from her?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? Hang on a sec, let me check. Ah, nope, nothing.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Girls, really, you don't need to worry. They're just having a good time over there.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Right you are. Honoka has been saying she wants to take her time and chat with everyone.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Oh, I see. And this is because of the School Idol Festival thing, right?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Hmm, I don't think that's all of it. I think Honoka saw the way she cares about all her friends and felt a connection.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: A connection.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I suppose they are the same kind of person.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Those three are pretty similar, aren't they? With the way they lead everyone forward with all that zest?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Come to think of it, you're right.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I think she's better suited for leader than anyone. She treasures and supports me, and everyone else, so much.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Better than anyone? Forgive me, but I cannot let that statement pass.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: She may be a little ditzy and unreliable here and there, but Honoka makes for a trustworthy leader. She works harder than anyone, and her passion and power always draws us in.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: U-Umi?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Well, our club president's pretty amazing, too. She thinks up our practice plans every day and records how they go in her log.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'm sorry, you two, but Chika doesn't fall behind, either. She may not look it, but she keeps a keen eye on those around her, and she's determined to never give up.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What are you talking about?! Our president's the best!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: No, Honoka's the best!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: It's Chika!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Our president!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Mmhmm. Everyone thinks their leader's the best, huh? I love Honoka, too!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: And I love Chika! Let's just say we all love the one closest to us, yeah?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I am sorry. Getting this worked up is rather embarrassing.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I'm sorry, too! I got r-really into it. Sorry.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I'm sorry, too.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: C'mon, girls, let's quit with the apologizing and talk about what we can do for the people we love.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Right you are. Honoka will probably do whatever it takes to bring the School Idol Festival back on track, so we'll have to support her.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Same for us! Chika spins into action the second she thinks of something, so we've gotta help her!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Yeah. Chika pushes herself a lot, so we've got to pick up the pieces.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I want to help our club president so she can do what she's aiming for, too.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Indeed. Let us work together to make sure those three can move as their hearts desire! For our leaders!

commands.speaker: You, Riko, Kotori, Kasumi
commands.line: For our leaders!
